des package

Submodules

des.cipher module

Functionality of DES implementation.

This module provides the classes and functions that facilitate the implementation of the DES algorithm based on the Electronic Code Book (ECB) encryption/decryption scheme.

class des.cipher.Cipher[source]

Bases: object

DES encryption algorithm using ECB scheme.

classmethod apply_permutation(binary_str, p)[source]

Apply permutation on binary string and return result string.

…

Parameters:

  • binary_str (str) – Binary String.

  • p (list) – Permutation list of integers.

Returns:

Permuted binary string.

Return type:

str

Raises:

  • TypeError – If the permutation list and/or its elements are invalid types.

  • ValueError – If the binary string is of invalid type or format.

classmethod decrypt_msg(encrypted_data, hex_key)[source]

Decrypt hexadecimal string and return string message.

…

Parameters:

  • encrypted_data (str) – Encrypted string in hexadecimal format.

  • hex_key (str) – Hexadecimal string.

Returns:

Original string message.

Return type:

str

Raises:

ValueError – If the encrypted string length is not a multiple of 16 or key is not hexadecimal or not 16 digits.

classmethod encrypt_msg(msg, hex_key)[source]

Encrypt string message and return encrypted string.

…

Parameters:

  • msg (str) – String message.

  • hex_key (str) – Hexadecimal string.

Returns:

Encrypted message in hexadecimal format.

Return type:

str

Raises:

  • TypeError – If the string message is not a str.

  • ValueError – If the message is empty or key is not hexadecimal or not 16 digits.

des.cipher.group_characters(string_val, n)[source]

Separate characters in string with a space.

…

Parameters:

  • string_val (str) – Given string.

  • n (int) – Number of characters in a group.

Returns:

Resulting string.

Return type:

str

Raises:

  • TypeError – If the string is not of type str, or n not of type int.

  • ValueError – If the string is empty, or n is negative/larger than string length.

Module contents

Data Encryption Standard (DES) Algorithm Implementation.

This package exports the cipher module.
